title: FIX YOUR BUGGY CILENT
body: I had about 6 games where either the accept screen wont go away or the game just doesn't load it, i've repaired it twice and nup nothing is wrong, cool, thanks for making me just lose random lp :)

replies.body:
Have you updated ur computer these days? Specifically, last night?
If yes, reset your computer to the preview version, and everything will be all right

Hmm, it *was* knocked down to "very rare" as far as I know but it seems to be making a resurgence.

I'll pass on these reports but if you could also submit a ticket to player support detailing the issue and including things like Windows/Mac, when it started happening, if you've ever had it before, if it's constant or intermittent, etc that would be fantastic.

It's also possible there is a local fix or bandaid they can offer you in the meantime:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Yes I have had this same issue, it's been especially bad tonight. Now I'm on a 25 minute time out from joining games for something completely out of my control. Thanks for wasting my weeknight Rito (Y)
